channel.title: PS3 Controllers
channel.description: Anyone know of a good third-party PS3 controller that's $30-45? I've been searching around and I haven't really seen too many good reviews for third-party controllers, so if I don't find one, I'll just go with the original DS3 controller. Post your reviews on them if you've tried them before as well.

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

ytuio9`:

I don’t like the xbox controllers myself, I think they’re too bulky. PS3 controllers are perfect in terms of size and they feel really lightweight imo. which is what I look for in a joypad (w/e)

i agree on the lightweight part and bulky part, but they just seem to fit my hand more comfortably. but after having my ps3 for so long ive adjusted so i guess the ps3 controller doesnt really bother me anymore. btw psn?

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

Aren’t Xbox controllers ~$20 more though?

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Pink_Phat Pink Phat
item.description:
@Pink_Phat wrote:

[quote=“Kodiak, post:12, topic:476987”]This topic is old, but I’d like to say one thing about ps3 controllers, I heard sony was trashing the dual shocks and moving onto new controllers… could they be shittier or better?

My opinion of ps3 controllers: xbox controllers fit your hands better, so I hope they shape them up more.[/quote]
Agreed that xbox controllers fit into your hands better, PS3 controllers are too small.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Kodiak Kodiak
item.description:
@Kodiak wrote:

This topic is old, but I’d like to say one thing about ps3 controllers, I heard sony was trashing the dual shocks and moving onto new controllers… could they be shittier or better?

My opinion of ps3 controllers: xbox controllers fit your hands better, so I hope they shape them up more.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Hyperius Hyperius
item.description:
@Hyperius wrote:

I suggest buying a Sony Ps3 Controller. Might be worth more, but it the long run it’s cheaper. I once went to a friend of mine and we were playing fifa 13 on his ps3. He gave me this shitty Chinese-made controller and like most of the people said above, the analogs were broken, and when you push a button it literally stays locked in.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @B2300_T4nk B2300 T4nk
item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“ytuio9`, post:8, topic:476987”]I’ve bought a “fake” ps3 controller before, I’ll admit it was relatively cheap but the quality was terrible, it kept “freezing”, the right analog stick was oversensitive and the left broke after ~2 weeks of usage, I really wouldn’t repeat the purchase.[/quote] That’s cause it’s Chinese bought from a random Egyptian store l0l.

@OP Just save up for the original DS3 ones. A used one might be ok to buy if you don’t mind having dead sperm on your body.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

Kodiak:

Like Niall said, any off-brand I’ve ever boughten had horrid analog sticks and they were super sensitive etc. I just stick to the original controllers. Oh and pm your psn niall

my psn is “Niall_”, totally original I know

the one I bought wasn’t an off-brand ps3 controller though, it was marketed as a genuine but was a counterfeit

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

I’ve bought a “fake” ps3 controller before, I’ll admit it was relatively cheap but the quality was terrible, it kept “freezing”, the right analog stick was oversensitive and the left broke after ~2 weeks of usage, I really wouldn’t repeat the purchase.

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

on the topic of ‘fake’ ps3 controllers, I bought one and the analog sticks were awful, you had to tilt them a good 15-20 degrees before any aiming/movement registered, compared to an official one where the movement/aiming is instant

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Controllers
item.dc:creator: @Null_Amount N_A
item.description:
@Null_Amount wrote:

[quote=“ox random xi, post:4, topic:476987”][quote author=Kodiak link=topic=595178.msg4191289#msg4191289 date=1356836489]
Explain what you mean. A custom one, a modded one, or downright xbox look a like one.
[/quote]
He wants a controller for the PS3 that isn’t Sony branded so it doesn’t cost $50.[/quote]
^

Off-brand merchandise are generally less expensive than their name-brand counterpart. For example the Tomee PS3 controller. Looks basically the same as the DS3 controller but it’s a lot less expensive ($10, but you get what you pay for on that one). I’m just seeing if anyone knows of a controller that’s relatively good but won’t cost me an arm and a leg to get.

Read full topic
